word: FOR MORE THAN EIGHTY YEARS ELLEN WHITE'S MUCH-LOVED BOOK STEPS TO CHRIST HAS BEEN A BEST SELLER, WITH AN ESTIMATED 16 MILLION COPIES DISTRIBUTED IN A HUNDRED LANGUAGES. ITS APPEAL FOR COMMITMENT TO CHRIST HAS BEEN ACCEPTED BY YOUNG AND OLD. A NEW LIFE JOINS IT AS A COMPANION BOOK OFFERING FURTHER GUIDANCE TOWARD A LIFE OF GENUINE REVIVAL AND REFORMATION.
